chapter.title: About This Guide
chapter.para: The Failure Recovery for TxCore and TXOJ contains information on how to use JBoss Transactions 4.10.0 failure recovery system when not embedding it within an application server or using TXOJ.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This guide is most relevant to engineers who are responsible for administering JBoss Transactions 4.10.0 installations.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: You should have installed JBoss Transactions 4.10.0. The reader should be familiar with the main Failure Recovery Guide.
